newsitem.title: ZAIRE: Rwanda's ambassador to Zaire resigns.
newsitem.headline: Rwanda's ambassador to Zaire resigns.

text.p: Rwanda's ambassador to Zaire said on Saturday that he had resigned in protest at his government's aggression in eastern Zaire.
Antoine Nyilinkindi told Zairean state radio that he opposed the settlement of disagreements by force of arms.
"I condemn the hegemonistic ambitions and the revision of borders inherited from colonialism," he added.
The radio said the ambassador was putting himself in the hands of the Zairean authorities for safekeeping.
Zaire accuses Tutsi-led Rwanda of sending soldiers into its eastern refugee provinces to fight alongside Tutsi rebels in the region.
